channel.title: Where to change the xp rate [Dementhium base]
channel.description:
I cannot find were to change the xp rates, i've searched in the search bar and seem to not find the correct place. I've also checked other sites for tutorials. I thought i saw a tutorial a while back of how to but now i can't find it... Can someone please tell me where to change the xp rate or know a tutorial i can use?
Thanks, Pray4urlife

item.title: Where to change the xp rate [Dementhium base]
item.dc:creator: @TiVo TiVo
item.description:
@TiVo wrote:

[quote=“pray4urlife, post:3, topic:433696”]Is this it?

public static final double XP_MODIFIER = 50.0;

public void addExperience(int skill, double exp) {
	int oldLevel = getLevelForExperience(skill);
	int oldCombat = getCombatLevel();
	double experience;
	if (skill == ATTACK || skill == DEFENCE || skill == STRENGTH || skill == RANGE || skill == MAGIC || skill == HITPOINTS) {
		experience = exp * XP_MODIFIER * 2;
	} else {
		experience = exp * (player.isDoubleXP() ? (XP_MODIFIER * 1.5) : (XP_MODIFIER));
	}[/quote]

No, that’s the firemaking class…

Read full topic
item.source: Where to change the xp rate [Dementhium base]

item.title: Where to change the xp rate [Dementhium base]
item.dc:creator: @pray4urlife pray4urlife
item.description:
@pray4urlife wrote:

Is this it?

public static final double XP_MODIFIER = 50.0;

public void addExperience(int skill, double exp) {
	int oldLevel = getLevelForExperience(skill);
	int oldCombat = getCombatLevel();
	double experience;
	if (skill == ATTACK || skill == DEFENCE || skill == STRENGTH || skill == RANGE || skill == MAGIC || skill == HITPOINTS) {
		experience = exp * XP_MODIFIER * 2;
	} else {
		experience = exp * (player.isDoubleXP() ? (XP_MODIFIER * 1.5) : (XP_MODIFIER));
	}

Read full topic
